## utils.Coordinate.scale() method

Scales this coordinate by the given scale factor.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
scale(s: number): Coordinate;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  s | number | The scale factor to use for both x and y dimensions.  This coordinate after scaling. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Coordinate
